programme.desc: A young woman is getting married and her adoptive father is delighted. However, when her biological father arrives, a battle between the two fathers begins.

programme.title: Social Files: Rating: 13, CRIME, 2011
programme.desc: A social worker has to deal with her own stubborn and errant daughter, who is in danger of being killed by drug syndicates.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: The Room Divider: Rating: PG13, Comedy, 2013
programme.desc: A gullible man is about to become the new chancellor of his community. However, then he gets into a sticky situation that could jeopardise his marriage and his new job.

programme.title: Bo Mma: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2021
programme.desc: A spoiled mama's boy has his relationship with his mother put to the test when he starts dating. Who will remain standing by his side: his mother or his new love?

programme.title: Thula Thula: Rating: 13, Mystery, 2019
programme.desc: A group of friends are on a road trip. While passing a small town, they realise they've run out of petrol. They stop at a petrol station but there's no one in sight.

programme.title: Abo Makoti: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: An honest and dedicated mama's boy finds his morals and values compromised when his mother puts pressure on him to take a wife and settle down.

programme.title: Uthandolusha: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: After a terrible car accident, a young couple struggles to rekindle their love as their lives take different directions, leaving them both torn and tormented.

programme.title: Boshego: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: After befriending a drug kingpin's nephew, a determined undercover cop takes it upon himself to save the young man from a life of crime.

programme.title: Umhlolokazi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: When Ntombikayise loses her husband, she discovers that he has a whole other life that he and his family have kept hidden from her for years.

programme.title: Magwinya Money: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A struggling single mother who sells fat cakes on the street finds a bag of money and a gun in her trolley. It goes missing, and the owner of the bag comes for it.

programme.title: Regret: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A woman leaves her security guard boyfriend for a man who is much wealthier. She soon regrets her decision when the man leaves her with more problems than money.

programme.title: Magadi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Two ethnic groups need to see eye to eye for the lobola negotiations to go well, but they have preconceived ideas of each other, and negotiations do not start on a good note.

programme.title: Imali Yethu: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Long-standing tensions arise when a father dies just before Christmas, leaving his fortune to his nephew instead of his son and siblings.

programme.title: Kortes: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Kortes, a young woman living with dwarfism, is happy with her boyfriend, Themba. This all changes when he introduces her to his family, who disapprove of their relationship.

programme.title: Sam'sokolo: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: When Kamohelo wins a lotto prize of R7,5 million, he gets his friend Mlungisi to claim on his behalf. But when Mlungisi starts blowing it, he must scam the scammer.

programme.title: Waduma Umilani: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Milani and Ayanda own a makeup brand and spend their time offering makeup demos. Their friendship gets tested when they meet Cindy, an ambassador for a famous makeup brand.

programme.title: Mmino Wa Lerato: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A wayward teen falls in love with the lead singer of a church choir and joins to get close to her. When his friends find out, he must make a difficult choice.

programme.title: Dark Intensions: Rating: 16, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Lucille's nightmare begins when a young lady claims to be her husband's daughter from his previous marriage. She begins to question her motive when she moves in with them.

programme.title: Isivumelwano: Rating: 16, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Zandile, a beautiful young girl has a fallout with her 'blesser.' Siyabonga shows her that there's more to life than the material things she has been chasing for so long.

programme.title: Perfect Lobola: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: On the eve of his lobola negotiations, Phesheya doesn't have the money. The pressure mounts to come up with something.

programme.title: Nkosazane: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: A orphaned princess is heir to the throne, but her evil stepmother takes control of it. The princess escapes death and is forced into exile but tries to win back her inheritance.

programme.desc: Two lovers from different backgrounds fall in love, but their families will do everything in their power to keep them apart.

programme.title: Gomora: Season 3, Episode 131
programme.desc: 'S3/E131'. Miss Biyela's car mystery continues. Teddy is very awkward around Tshiamo. Sonto has found a new home for MaMbhele.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 189
programme.desc: 'S2/E189'. Donald comes home and Alakhe is not with him, while Puleng and Mandla decide to keep the affair a secret.

programme.title: The Queen: Season 6, Episode 216
programme.desc: 'S6/E216 - The Attack'. Chaos erupts at the Khoza mansion. Schumacher gets the shock of a lifetime when he returns to the Zulu House.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 191
programme.desc: 'S3/E191 - What Happened, Lindani?'. A tragic situation forces two families to come to together while Cobra is determined to make a few changes in his life.

programme.title: Umzi Watsha: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Lwando and his wife have been married for a few years. Their perfect lives are turned upside down when Lwando's estranged daughter arrives.

programme.title: Umhlukanisi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: After seven years of marriage, a domestic worker finds herself falling in love with her boss. Her husband finds out and manipulates her to rob the family she works for.

programme.title: The Lucky Star Colab: Season 1, Episode 7
programme.desc: 'S1/E7'. Uncle Vinny joins the gurus as the remaining 9 Colabers have just a few hours to conceptualise and shoot a music video. Who will have luck on their side when DJ Zinhle drops a wild card?

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 104
programme.desc: 'S1/E104'. Worried and distracted after learning about Kwenzo's incident, Sibongile gathers the courage to call him. Gcina has set up a surprise party to celebrate Vusi being CEO.

programme.title: News On Wethu: Season 2, Episode 28
programme.desc: 'S2/E28'. The daily news bulletin covering the latest breaking news locally and internationally. Presented in IsiZulu and IsiXhosa, we bring you a new era of current and reliable news coverage.

programme.title: Gomora: Season 3, Episode 132
programme.desc: 'S3/E132'. Zibuko almost shoots an innocent woman. Ous' Tiny promises to take Sizwe in, but under dire conditions. Tshiamo and Teddy play cat and mouse.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 192
programme.desc: 'S3/E192 - Dodging Death'. Paulina reminds Tumi that the chickens will come home to roost eventually. Cobra has an encounter with Lindiwe that leaves him feeling discouraged.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 190
programme.desc: 'S2/E190'. Donald suffers heavy consequences for his role in Alakhe's disappearance. Puleng plays a dangerous game with Mandla, with equally alarming results.

programme.title: The Queen: Season 6, Episode 217
programme.desc: 'S6/E217 - Lifeline'. There's no love lost in the battlefield as the Khoza's try to stay strong for a wounded MaJali. Thando tries to make things right. Patronella pays dearly for her accusations.

programme.title: Uzulu Nomhlaba: Season 1, Episode 9
programme.desc: 'S1/E9'. Zulu sees the video footage of Hlengiwe and Mhlaba kissing and does the unthinkable. The Ntuli household gets riddled with bullets. Vakashile finds Zulu and Mhlaba in a deadly fight and drops a bombshell.

programme.title: Big Brother Mzansi: Season 4, Episode 37
programme.desc: 'S4/E37'. As the housemates continue to get to know each other, new layers are revealed. Strategies are also under review, as tensions continue to rise.

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 104
programme.desc: 'S1/E104'. Worried and distracted after learning about Kwenzo's incident, Sibongile gathers the courage to call him. Gcina has set up a surprise party to celebrate Vusi being CEO.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Nazo: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: A beautiful young pickpocketer is forced to embark on a journey of love and redemption after stealing the wallet of a noble and handsome stranger.

programme.title: Trigger Happy: Rating: 16, Drama, 2012
programme.desc: What starts off as a simple visit to the general store becomes a day of violence, suspense and terror when three masked thugs attack the store and hold everyone hostage.

programme.title: Ngiyakuthanda Thando: Rating: PG, Drama, 2013
programme.desc: A young guy meets the girl of his dreams and plans grand romantic gestures that never quite work. The situation is made worse by the fact that she doesn't notice him.

programme.title: Mletheni: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: When her daughter goes missing, a woman's faith in all that is good is put to the test as a dubious detective centres his investigation around her husband.

programme.title: Reflections: Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: 'S1/E1 of 4 - Friend Or Foe'. Business at the New You hair salon is seriously on the decline and Zanele's frustration is taken out on Thuli. She must find a way to help the business if she wants to keep her job.

programme.title: The Knight: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: An engaged executive meets the man of her dreams during a crisis in her life, but when disappointment seems to follow her, she's left wondering who her heart belongs to.

programme.title: Emakhazeni: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: A young man struggles to juggle being the perfect son as well as partying. He has to take over the family business. Will he keep up with the double life?

programme.title: Mafele Aga Thabo: Rating: 13, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: Thabo goes to a sangoma to strengthen his business and he is given a bag with two cockroaches. Every time the cockroaches give birth his business gets bigger.

programme.title: Iyodibana: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: A convicted criminal on parole is determined to change her life for the better. However, when she's forced to participate in a robbery, she must make a difficult decision.

programme.title: Mama: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: A young woman stuck in a loveless marriage decides to confront her cheating husband. However, things go from bad to worse when he kicks her out of their home.

programme.title: Gog'flo: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: Gog'Flo is assumed the evil village witch. After her twin sister set her up, the village cast her out, but her absence opens the village up to a series of misfortunes.

programme.title: One Coffin: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: A funeral parlour owner is in desperate need of heart surgery. He decides to steal and re-use the coffin he buries his clients in to fund the procedure.

programme.title: Bafana Ba Bruno: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Two brothers have to completely change their lifestyles in order to obtain their late father's inheritance.

programme.title: Mzamo: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: During the coronavirus lockdown, two best friends find themselves at the risk of being caught while cheating on their wives.

programme.title: Isizungu: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A widow travels to visit her daughter for a week to get a breather and spend time with her. She never thought that her age love would come knocking on her door.

programme.title: Moshimane: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: After dating for a year, Moshimane knows he wants to spend the rest of his life with Lulu, but confessing his undying love and intentions to her on their anniversary day turns ugly.

programme.title: Istina: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: When Kanana's boyfriend proposes to her, she is over the moon. But then her boyfriend tells her that he wants his female friend to be his best man.

programme.title: Ziright Igirls: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Four first-year varsity girls have their craziest night out. When one of them goes missing, the trio must find her before their exam the next morning.

programme.title: Papa Youthful: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A man in his late 30s is stuck in a dead-end job. He reminisces about his old days as a DJ until his friend helps him realise it's not too late to start over.

programme.title: Makhe: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A long-running feud between two former boxing rivals reaches fever pitch when they become neighbours. With Bab'Jomo convinced Bab'Edward cheated when he handed him his only loss.

programme.title: Hatred: Rating: 16, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: The favouritism shown to one son by his parents sparks and fuels hatred between two brothers, Mohau and Godfrey.

programme.title: Dhulas: Rating: 13, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: Three friends are preparing for a road trip to a small town in the Free State to bid farewell to one of their best friends, who will be laid to rest in the next two days.

programme.title: Zimele: Rating: 13, Romance, 2018
programme.desc: After the death of her father, a young girl finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and stepsister, who reduce her to an ordinary labourer.

programme.title: Tokoloshe Is Dead: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2012
programme.desc: When a man comes across a dead rat on his way home, he decides to tell his superstitious neighbours that the dead rat is in fact a Tokoloshe, and that he killed it.

programme.title: The Secret: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: What would you do if you found out that your whole life was a lie? Ziyanda is faced with the cold truth and it's too much to handle.

programme.desc: When a young man falls for a wealthy woman, their love is tested as their families come against their union. Will their love crumble under the weight of the condemnation?

programme.title: Lokshin FM: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: A struggling community radio station has all the potential to become a success, but it becomes near impossible with a ruthless station owner lurking in the backgrounds.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 191
programme.desc: 'S3/E191 - What Happened, Lindani?'. A tragic situation forces two families to come to together while Cobra is determined to make a few changes in his life.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 192
programme.desc: 'S3/E192 - Dodging Death'. Paulina reminds Tumi that the chickens will come home to roost eventually. Cobra has an encounter with Lindiwe that leaves him feeling discouraged.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 193
programme.desc: 'S3/E193 - Bad News Travels Fast'. Tumi finds herself regretting decisions she made in her past, while Cobra also prepares to start afresh.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 194
programme.desc: 'S3/E194 - Trump Card'. Tumi gets an unexpected ally and Cobra's past slaps him in the face.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 195
programme.desc: 'S3/E195'. Just when Cobra is trying to put his life together, a ghost from the past shows up and turns everything upside down. Paulina has reasons to believe that everything will work out.

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 103
programme.desc: 'S1/E103'. After his fall, Kwenzo is found and rescued by Nomalanga. Vuma gives Sibongile back her phone, and she is distraught when she learns about Kwenzo's incident from Wenzeni.

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 104
programme.desc: 'S1/E104'. Worried and distracted after learning about Kwenzo's incident, Sibongile gathers the courage to call him. Gcina has set up a surprise party to celebrate Vusi being CEO.

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 105
programme.desc: 'S1/E105'. Wenzeni helps Kwenzo move back into the penthouse while Deliwe puts her plan into motion. Nomfundo is stung when her new replacement arrives just as she is about to leave.

programme.title: The Lucky Star Colab: Season 1, Episode 7
programme.desc: 'S1/E7'. Uncle Vinny joins the gurus as the remaining 9 Colabers have just a few hours to conceptualise and shoot a music video. Who will have luck on their side when DJ Zinhle drops a wild card?

programme.title: News On Wethu: Season 2, Episode 32
programme.desc: 'S2/E32'. The daily news bulletin covering the latest breaking news locally and internationally. Presented in IsiZulu and IsiXhosa, we bring you a new era of current and reliable news coverage.

programme.title: Clash Of The Choirs SA: Season 4, Episode 7
programme.desc: 'S4/E7'. The choirs pay heartfelt homage to music's fallen legends, channelling emotions and memories into stunning performances. The stage is filled with nostalgia and respect as they resurrect iconic tunes.

programme.title: Date My Family: Season 10, Episode 28
programme.desc: 'S10/E28'. 27-year-old Karabo from Nigel is our bachelorette. An environmentalist and part-time model and presenter, Karabo is looking for a tall and dark man who's kind and considerate.

programme.title: Uzulu Nomhlaba: Season 1, Episode 10
programme.desc: 'S1/E10'. Zulu struggles to deal with the new revelation in his life. Mfecane calls a sangoma to rid him of his nightmares. Zulu and Hlengiwe are involved in an accident.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 189
programme.desc: 'S2/E189'. Donald comes home and Alakhe is not with him, while Puleng and Mandla decide to keep the affair a secret.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 190
programme.desc: 'S2/E190'. Donald suffers heavy consequences for his role in Alakhe's disappearance. Puleng plays a dangerous game with Mandla, with equally alarming results.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 191
programme.desc: 'S2/E191'. Alakhe's disappearance is a mystery until Robert receives a call from an old friend. Mandla and Puleng commit the biggest sin.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 192
programme.desc: 'S2/E192'. Robert receives a life-threatening ultimatum to save Alakhe's life. Puleng wants to continue the secret affair with Mandla, but Mandla is non-committal.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: 10 Steps To Make...: Rating: PG13, Romance, 2014
programme.desc: Desperate for a ring, a young woman turns to a '10 Steps to Make Him Propose' article to get her boyfriend to go down on one knee.

programme.title: Umntwana: Rating: 13, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: A woman who lost her baby is being haunted by nightmares of the child from next door - who has suddenly disappeared with her mother.

programme.title: Be Mine: Rating: PG, Drama, 2012
programme.desc: A teenager nearly loses the girl of his dreams after he records videos of her and uploads them on the web in an attempt to win her heart.

programme.title: Ho Kena Ho Eona: Rating: 16, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: After Dineo gets retrenched and evicted, she moves into her boyfriend's place with her daughter. Things take a turn for the worse when a force from inside starts haunting them.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: 10 Steps To Make...: Rating: PG13, Romance, 2014
programme.desc: Desperate for a ring, a young woman turns to a '10 Steps to Make Him Propose' article to get her boyfriend to go down on one knee.

programme.title: Magadi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Two ethnic groups need to see eye to eye for lobola negotiations to go well, but they have preconceived ideas of each other, and negotiations do not start off on a good note.

programme.title: Inhlanhla: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: When an Uber driver finds a bag that was left by a woman who caught his attention, he embarks on a series of misadventures as he desperately tries to return it to her.

programme.title: Mina Nabangani Bam: Rating: 16, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A girls' weekend away turns into a deadly hostage drama. No one is safe.

programme.title: Ay'phakelwa: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Two lovers from different backgrounds fall in love, but their families will do everything in their power to keep them apart.

programme.title: Egamini: Rating: 16, Comedy, 2022
programme.desc: A former rich student invents a fake life just to go to his high school reunion to show off to the girl who broke his heart.

programme.title: Ma: Rating: 13, Sci-Fi, 2022
programme.desc: A militant and indifferent mother is granted the opportunity to travel to the past to prevent a tragic accident that took her daughter's life.

programme.title: Taxi Queens: Rating: 13, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: A young girl would do anything to make it and joins the taxi queens' gang to make money, but how far will this take her?

programme.title: Mmino Wa Lerato: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A wayward teen falls in love with the lead singer of a church choir and joins to get close to her. When his friends find out, he must make a difficult choice.

programme.title: Makhe: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A long-running feud between two former boxing rivals reaches fever pitch when they become neighbours. With Bab'Jomo convinced Bab'Edward cheated when he handed him his only loss.

programme.title: Icherrie Yam: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: When Lindiso finally gets together with the love of his life, he thinks his luck has finally turned. However, things change when her thug ex-boyfriend gets released from prison.

programme.title: S'phila Njani: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A girl seduced by a gang finds herself in a dilemma when she witnesses its leader shoot a boy she knows. She is torn between her freedom and helping the victim's family.

programme.title: Feluthando: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A man leaves his criminal ways behind when he falls in love with a church girl, but their love is doomed as they face opposition from parents and other family members.

programme.title: Vuthela: Rating: 13, Documentary, 2022
programme.desc: Mvelo, an aspiring musician, feels a strong connection to his absent father and sets off on a mission to find him. He walks an emotional journey full of soulful tunes.

programme.title: Uchef Nosi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2023
programme.desc: An incredible young cook gets an opportunity to be trained by her childhood hero at his restaurant, but she learns heroes can turn into villains when her recipes are stolen from her.

programme.title: Beyond The River: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2017

programme.title: Mwinemushi: Season 2, Episode 7

programme.title: My Kitchen Party: Season 1, Episode 2

programme.title: Date My Family Zambia: Season 2, Episode 4
programme.desc: 'S2/E4'. Date My Family helps singletons find love by sending them on dates with their potential partner's family. Can you really trust your family to help you find love?
